subj-group.subject: FIRST CONCURRENT CONFERENCE SESSION: THE PROPERTY TAX FACES THE SEVENTIES

title-group.article-title: COMPUTER ASSISTED ASSESSMENTS: POTENTIALITIES AND IMPLICATIONS FOR THE ORGANIZATIONAL STRUCTURE OF PROPERTY TAX ADMINISTRATION
